statements: SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData;
SELECT machine_id, downtime_start, downtime_end FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData;
SELECT id, downtime_reason FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData;
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData ORDER BY downtime_start DESC;
SELECT machine_id, downtime_start FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, downtime_reason FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_start <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, machine_id, downtime_start FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason LIKE '%equipment failure%';
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_start >= '2022-01-01' AND downtime_end <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(id) AS downtime_count FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData
SELECT machine_id, downtime_start FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason = 'Maintenance'
SELECT id, machine_id, downtime_reason FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData ORDER BY downtime_start DESC
SELECT * FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_type = 'Equipment' AND bottleneck_description LIKE '%fault%'
SELECT bottleneck_type, bottleneck_analysis FROM ProductionBottlenecks
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason = 'Machine Malfunction';
SELECT * FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, downtime_start, downtime_end FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData WHERE downtime_start >= '2022-01-01' AND downtime_end <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT bottleneck_type, bottleneck_description FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_analysis LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT id, machine_id, downtime_reason FROM FactoryAutomationDowntimeData ORDER BY downtime_start DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Factory_Downtime ORDER BY Start_Time DESC;
SELECT Machine_ID, Start_Time, End_Time FROM Factory_Downtime WHERE Machine_ID = 5;
SELECT * FROM Production_Bottlenecks WHERE Bottleneck_ID = 3;
SELECT Machine_Name, Location FROM Machine_Details WHERE Status = 'Active';
SELECT ID, Start_Time, Downtime_Reason FROM Factory_Downtime ORDER BY ID ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Factory_Downtime WHERE Machine_ID = 101 ORDER BY Start_Time DESC;
SELECT Machine_Name, Location FROM Machine_Details WHERE Status = 'Active';
SELECT Machine_ID, MIN(Start_Time) AS Earliest_StartTime FROM Factory_Downtime GROUP BY Machine_ID;
SELECT DISTINCT Bottleneck_Description FROM Production_Bottlenecks;
SELECT * FROM Factory_Downtime WHERE Downtime_Reason LIKE '%Maintenance%' AND End_Time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, machine_id, downtime_duration, downtime_reason, downtime_datetime FROM factory_production_data;
SELECT * FROM machine_details ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, machine_status FROM machine_details WHERE machine_location = 'Factory A';
SELECT bottleneck_id, bottleneck_description FROM production_bottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_category = 'Maintenance';
SELECT machine_id, production_rate, efficiency_percentage FROM production_efficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage > 80;
SELECT * FROM factory_production_data WHERE downtime_duration > 30 ORDER BY downtime_datetime DESC
SELECT machine_name, machine_location FROM machine_details WHERE machine_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM production_bottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_category = 'Technical'
SELECT machine_id, production_rate FROM production_efficiency ORDER BY production_rate ASC
SELECT id, downtime_reason FROM factory_production_data WHERE downtime_duration > 0
SELECT * FROM DowntimeData;
SELECT id, machine_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, downtime_reason FROM DowntimeData;
SELECT machine_name, machine_type FROM Machines;
SELECT * FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM DowntimeData WHERE downtime_reason = 'Machine Failure';
SELECT machine_name, machine_type FROM Machines WHERE machine_type IN ('Type A', 'Type B');
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT bottleneck_name, bottleneck_description FROM ProductionBottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_name LIKE 'Production%';
SELECT id, downtime_start, downtime_end, downtime_reason FROM DowntimeData WHERE downtime_start >= '2022-01-01' AND downtime_end <= '2022-01-31';
